lead_paragraph: When magician and master of deception "The Amazing Randi" learned that his partner of 25 years was living under a false identity, it became unclear if Randi is the deceiver or the deceived.
snippet: When magician and master of deception "The Amazing Randi" learned that his partner of 25 years was living under a false identity, it became unclear if Randi is the deceiver or the deceived.
